Address.value: 6101 BOLLINGER CANYON ROAD,SUITE 500, SAN RAMON, California, 94583, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Cooper Companies operates two units: CooperVision and CooperSurgical. Accounting for approximately 75% of total sales, CooperVision is the second- largest player in the oligopolistic contact lens market. Over 50% of CooperVision's sales are in international territories. The second unit, CooperSurgical, develops and manufactures diagnostic and surgical products for gynecologists and obstetricians, including the Paragard IUD, which Cooper acquired from Teva in 2017.

value.name: Daniel G. McBride
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
